StatDef.label: ranged damage per second
StatDef.description: Average damage dealt per second in ranged combat at the optimal range of this weapon. This doesn't factor in the shooter's skill, so actual damage will be less

StatDef.label: max ranged damage per second
StatDef.description: Average damage dealt per second in ranged combat, assuming all shots hit. This doesn't factor in the shooter's skill or the inherent accuracy of the weapon, so actual damage will be less
